description: LOGIC MUSHROOMS - A secret that was kept hidden by some of the smartest and most logical minds in history. Mystical forests are where they have logically evolved over 3000 years. Come, experience some Logic!!

Strong women are not simply born. They are forged through the challenges of life. With each challenge, they grow mentally & emotionally. They move forward with their head held high & a strength that can not be denied.

META GALA- Everyone is invited to the embodiment of the internet, where instead of viewing content, YOU ARE IN IT ! Meet Uttama Villian, Harl.eth Quinn, Meta Maami, Gangubhai, EVIL.eth, WazirxEIST, Mathilda and more!

They can help you point to people and things around you. They add emphasis and structure when you talk. They give clues about your emotional state. They are not always connected to what you’re saying. HAND GESTURES!

ETHNIC HUES OF WOMEN - India is diverse and is home to several communities, each having its own culture and tradition. ‘Ethnic hues’ is a vibrant collection of artworks, representing the vast cultural diversity of India.

Given the lack of proper medical resources, for veterinary care, most exotic animals such as rabbits & birds do not get the required care. By owing a ‘NomNom’, you’re donating to NomnomIndia and ensuring a better life for them!

Indian women in today's day and age are far more aware, decisive, bold, and opinionated than they used to be earlier. There is an increased awareness about the need for women's empowerment, and equality of women!
Nature is wonderful, birds and insects are tiny wonders of nature! This is an Exotic collection of pretty Birds and interesting Insects, less seen by the naked eye but captured through a lens.

Deviyan is a collection of Goddesses representing various forms of nature and colours. Their vibrance can be experienced as PFPs, prints, and wallpapers on your digital device for personal use. May you be blessed with the spiritual energy each emanates.

What you see is not real. What you sense is not real. What you hear is not real either! You believe the world to be beautiful, the world turns beautiful. Reality is defined by what you believe. The power is within you!

A TRIBE with a vibe. Just because humans are highly evolved we ignore other living species around us. This series tries to showcase the powerful, bold animals in a totally different vibe. If they stood with us, dressed and talked like us, WE HAD NO CHANCE!

The Duality of Reality. Reality is subjective.  What we perceive to be our true reality may not be the reality that others see. Serenity for someone, chaos for someone else! This collection tries to depict the dual nature of reality.

WOMANIYA - Women have many roles and many phases in their lives. A series of roles that they perform. Everyday is a struggle for many! And yet, they are determined to carry these roles perfectly because they believe that’s what an ideal woman should do!

A collection featuring 3 different series of photography NFTs consisting of 'Travel Series' - Photographs taken during travel at various destinations around India. 'Goa & its coast'- Photographs showing various moods of the Goan coastline. 'Winged Rover'- Bird photographs
